SEARCH
Package com.hotelapplication.backend

Class RoomManager

java.lang.Object
com.hotelapplication.backend.RoomManager
public class RoomManager extends Object
The RoomManager class provides methods to create, manage, and remove rooms in a hotel. It interacts with the Room and HotelManager classes for room management tasks such as setting room attributes, calculating prices, and managing reservations.
Author:
Alexander Boutselis
